name: Lovelines: Love Among Monsters
description:
Chicago. The “Crown Jewel of the Camarilla.” The Northside. Boystown, to be exact. 

Tonight, you're on the hunt, but not for the blood that sustains your nightly existence. Tonight, you're on the hunt: For power, for influence, and for love. 

Lovelines is a Vampire Dating Simulator that explores love amongst creatures of the night. (PG-13)
